title: New: Cheerleader – Do What You Want
content:
All the best songs have a good whistling section; The Dock of the Bay by Otis Redding, Two of Us by The Beatles and Pumped Up Kicks by Foster The People….

wait a second, scratch that last one. Cheerleader’s new track Do What You Want has a cutesy 60’s feel to it, sunshine drenched pop all the way, trickling with Beach Boys influence. Check out Do What You Want below.

Do What You Want by CHEERLEADER
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
